# Solutions-Based Professional Services for Canada Pension Plan Disability Return-to-Work Pilot

## Brief Description

The Income Security and Social Development Branch (ISSD) of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking a methodology consultant to support the second phase of the Canada Pension Plan Disability (CPPD) Return-to-Work (RTW) Pilot. The consultant will develop a data analysis strategy to interpret results collected from the sample of beneficiary participants by the RTW Navigators throughout the pilot project.

## Key Responsibilities

* Develop a comprehensive data analysis strategy to interpret results collected from beneficiary participants
* Conduct research to identify effective data collection and storage processes, quality control measures, and ethical considerations
* Integrate data from multiple sources to support the analysis and evaluation of pilot project results
* Collaborate with the RTW Project team to evaluate results and inform potential changes to program policy
* Liaise with operational and policy stakeholders to ensure effective data collection and integration

## Tender Details

* **Title**: Solutions-Based Professional Services for Canada Pension Plan Disability Return-to-Work Pilot
* **Reference Number**: cb-885-7739309

* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-27
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-23T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

## Applying for this Tender

* The tender description and related documents can be found on the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) website.
* Respondents must review the tender documents carefully and prepare a methodology consultant proposal outlining their approach and qualifications.
* Please submit your proposal electronically by the tender closing date and time.
